function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"The current health crisis, particularly the covid-19 pandemic, has directly impacted urban planning and architecture, necessitating the development of built environments with enhanced security measures to prevent the spread of infections and diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate research conducted to imagine how the antivirus-built environment would look","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for social distancing and quarantine as a design problem in the post-pandemic era","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Covid-19 spreading in built environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fragility of the real world","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Virus attacks on digital and built environment","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of sars-coronavirus-2 rna in sewage","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Volumes processed in rna extraction","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complexity of estimating covid-19 prevalence based on sars-cov-2 rna concentrations in sewage.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sewage data serving as a sensitive tool for early warning of increasing virus circulation in the population.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of virus in sewage before reported covid-19 cases in the population","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability in sars-cov-2 rna concentrations in city sewage","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of sars-cov-2 in sewage samples","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent quantification of sars-cov-2 in sewage samples","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variability in sensitivity of primer/probe sets for sars-cov-2 rna detection","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate recovery efficiency of coronavirus in wastewater samples","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of non-enveloped f+ rna phages for estimating coronavirus recovery efficiency","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unreliable quantification of sars-cov-2 in sewage due to qrt-pcr assay limitations","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection and quantification of sars-coronavirus-2 rna in sewage samples.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proxy for the period prevalence of covid-19 in the cities served by the wwtp.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Recovery efficiency of f-specific rna phages in purification and concentration steps.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential underreporting of covid-19 cases due to limited testing of individuals with severe symptoms.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on sewage surveillance as a sole early warning system for re- emergence of covid-19 in cities.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna in domestic wastewater suggesting circulation of covid-19 in communities.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 via respiratory droplets and fomites","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of sars-cov-2 in sewage and potential for health risks to workers","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increas in virus load in sewer systems due to circulation of the virus in the population","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Publication of controversial health guidelines","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited data duration less than four months in the selected studies","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Non-peer-reviewed manuscripts included in the analysis","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty and limitations in understanding the impact of climatic variables on the spread of covid-19","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Underreporting of new cases of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of peer review for included studies in the systematic review","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cold air causing vasoconstriction of the respiratory tract and weakening of the immune system","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dry cold air making the nasal mucosa prone to small ruptures, creating opportunities for virus invasion","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low or extremely cold temperature playing a positive role in reducing the transmission of coronavirus","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 in tropical climates due to heat intolerance of the virus and breakdown of lipid bilayer","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Seasonality and environmental influences on the spread of respiratory pathogens","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of public health interventions associated with certain humidity and temperature conditions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Suitable temperature and humidity range for the survival and transmission of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of simple correlation in statistical analysis","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Complex relationship between social and meteorological factors in coronavirus outbreaks","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limitations in the identification of confounding factors impacting the final analysis of included articles","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of secondary data due to the urgency of the global situation with the rapid spread of covid-19","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Extrapolation of results from studies conducted before the outbreak to the spread characteristics of covid-19 worldwide","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Methodological issues identified in the systematic review.","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High risk of bias in two studies investigating the effect of humidity on the transmission of sars-cov-2.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low certainty of evidence in studies on the association between temperature and humidity with the spread rate of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Observational studies with inherent risk of bias in the assessment of climate variables","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Homogeneity of results among the included studies","category":"Medium","confidence":"Legal risks"}]}
